alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Crawford; Huron; Richland; Seneca; Wyandot (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Richland, Huron, eastern Seneca, northwestern Ashland, northeastern Wyandot and northern Crawford Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 407 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Willard to near Sycamore. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Norwalk, Shelby, Bellevue, Willard, New London, Plymouth, Milan, Wakeman, New Washington, Bloomville, Sycamore, Savannah, Chatfield, Greenwich, Monroeville, Attica, Benton, North Fairfield, Republic and Bailey Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Crawford; Huron; Richland; Seneca; Wyandot
